column2:
"I think ARKS members are great! Like knights
in shining armor! I wish that could be me."

"Grr... How can I learn to use photons?
There must be a way..."

"You're an ARKS op, and I'm not. It's strange,
isn't it? We don't look all that different."

"You know how photons sometimes react to
emotions? I wonder what that's like."

"I think about photons all the time.
You'd think they'd have reacted to me
by now, at least a little."

"Dreams can come true! That's what I believe.
I won't give up on becoming an ARKS op!"

"I wonder if you've met my friend.
He's the one always moping around.
Look out for him for me, won't you?"

"Hm... There's got to be something.
Oh, don't mind me. I was just trying to
come up with a way to motivate someone."

"It would be easy enough for me to give up,
but then my friend would probably give up, too."

"He's always making things difficult for me,
even though he's already an ARKS op!
It can't be helped. I just have to keep trying."

"You think I'm wasting my efforts? Fine by me!
At least you recognize that I'm trying."

"Hey! I'm headed to another ARKS
ship to transport supplies!"

"It's my first time out in space.
I'm pretty excited!"

"Have you heard about that pop idol
who's causing a big fuss down in the
residential area?"

"I guess becoming a symbol
like that is one way to raise morale."

"Not like I have what it takes to do
that myself. Not a chance.
I'll find some way to make a difference, though."
